mapper.select: SELECT match_date, IF(gender_rule='M', '남성', IF(gender_rule='F', '여성', '혼성')) AS gender_rule, IF(level='L', '일반 (Lv 1~5)', IF(level='M', '중급 (Lv 3~5)', '고급 (Lv 5)')) AS level, fields_id, m.id, f.name, r.name, participation_fee, place, IF(man_to_man_rule='A', '3:3', IF(man_to_man_rule='B', '4:4', IF(man_to_man_rule='C', '5:5', IF(man_to_man_rule='D', '6:6', '7:7')))) AS man_to_man_rule, IF(floor_material='G', '잔디', '우레탄') AS floor_material, IF(shose_rule='F', '풋살화', '모든 신발') AS shose_rule, IF(shower_room='Y', '있음', '없음') AS shower_room, IF(park='Y', '있음', '없음') AS park, IF(shose_rent='Y', '가능', '불가능') AS shose_rent, IF(clothes_rent='Y', '가능', '불가능') AS clothes_rent, IF(area='A', '서울', IF(area='B', '경기', IF(area='C', '인천', IF(area='D', '대전', IF(area='E', '대구', IF(area='F', '부산', IF(area='G', '울산', IF(area='H', '광주', IF(area='I', '충북', IF(area='J', '경북', IF(area='K', '전북', IF(area='L', '충남', '경남')))))))))))) AS area, min_people, max_people, size, special_thing, m.id FROM matches m, fields f, managers r WHERE m.id = #{id} AND f.id = (SELECT fields_id FROM matches WHERE id = #{id}) AND r.id = (SELECT id FROM managers WHERE id = (SELECT managers_id FROM matches WHERE id = #{id}));

SELECT match_date, m.id, IF(gender_rule='M', '남성', IF(gender_rule='F', '여성', '혼성')) AS gender_rule, IF(level='L', '일반 (Lv 1~5)', IF(level='M', '중급 (Lv 3~5)', '고급 (Lv 5)')) AS level, status FROM matches m, users_matches u WHERE m.id = u.matches_id AND u.users_id = #{users_id};
SELECT id FROM matches WHERE match_date > now() AND id = #{id};
